tool.name: OGS: convertVtkDataArrayToVtkDataArray
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'convertVtkDataArrayToVtkDataArray'.
tool.command: for i in $in_mesh; do if [ "$i" != "None" ] && [ ! -e "$(basename $i)" ]; then ln -s "$i" "$(basename $i)"; fi; done; convertVtkDataArrayToVtkDataArray --new-property-data-type '$new_property_data_type' #if str($new_property_name).strip() != 'None' and str($new_property_name).strip() != '': --new-property-name '$new_property_name' #end if --existing-property-name '$existing_property_name' --in-mesh '$in_mesh.element_identifier' --out-mesh output_1.vtk

param.name: new_property_name
param.label: new property name
param.help: the new cell data array (PropertyVector) the values are stored

tool.help: This tool runs the **convertVtkDataArrayToVtkDataArray** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
